label: ham
subject: Re: PERL arrays
body: 7 (return) [ Schisma igitur illo tempore confus¾ mulieris iracundia peperit; ambitus nutrivit; avaritia roboravit. Optatus, l. i. c. 19. The language of Purpurius is that of a furious madman. Dicitur te necasse lilios sororis tu¾ duos. Purpurius respondit: Putas me terreri a te.. occidi; et occido eos qui contra me faciunt. Acta Concil. Cirtenais, ad calc. Optat. p. 274. When C¾cilian was invited to an assembly of bishops, Purpurius said to his brethren, or rather to his accomplices, ÒLet him come hither to receive our imposition of hands, and we will break his head by way of penance.Ó Optat. l. i. c. 19.]
